item.title: 使用HTML作为Python程序的UI

vertical-align: middle; max-width: 100%; margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 0;" title lang xml:lang dir></span></div></p><h2 style="font-family: inherit; font-weight: bold; line-height: 1.1; color: inherit; margin-top: 21px; margin-bottom: 10.5px; font-size: 2.15em; margin: 1.2em 0 .6em 0; text-align: start;">&#x95EE;&#x9898;</h2><h3 style="font-family: inherit; font-weight: bold; color: inherit; margin-top: 21px; margin-bottom: 10.5px; font-size: 1.7em; margin: 1.2em 0 .6em 0; text-align: start; line-height: 1.6;">1. SimpleHTTPServer&#x65E0;&#x6CD5;&#x901A;&#x8FC7;&#x7BA1;&#x9053;&#x8F93;&#x51FA;&#x4FE1;&#x606F;</h3><p style="margin: 0 0 1.1em; line-height: 1.6;">&#x5728;&#x505A;&#x7B2C;4&#x6B65;&#x7684;&#x65F6;&#x5019;&#xFF0C;&#x9047;&#x5230;&#x4E86;&#x5F88;&#x5927;&#x7684;&#x632B;&#x6298;&#x3002;&#x7B2C;1&#x6B65;&#x91C7;&#x7528;subprocess&#x6A21;&#x5757;&#xFF0C;&#x6253;&#x5F00;&#x547D;&#x4EE4;<code style="font-family: &apos;Source Code Pro&apos;,monospace; font-size: .9em; padding: 2px 4px; color: #c7254e; background-color: #f9f2f4; white-space: normal; border-radius: 4px;">python MyHTTPServer.py</code>&#x3002;&#x5BF9;subprocess&#x7684;&#x4ECB;&#x7ECD;&#x53EF;&#x53C2;&#x8003;&#xFF1A;</p><ul style="margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 1.1em; line-height: 1.6;"><li style="line-height: 1.6;"><a href="https://app.yinxiang.com/shard/s10/nl/161681/3fcc11e2-7d72-479f-9228-df72909bd465" target="_blank" style="background: transparent; color: #1980e6; text-decoration: none;"> python&#x5B50;&#x8FDB;&#x7A0B;&#x6A21;&#x5757;subprocess&#x8BE6;&#x89E3;&#x4E0E;&#x5E94;&#x7528;&#x5B9E;&#x4F8B; &#x4E4B;&#x4E00;</a></li><li style="line-height: 1.6;"><a href="https://docs.python.org/2/library/subprocess.html#subprocess.CalledProcessError" target="_blank" style="background: transparent; color: #1980e6; text-decoration: none;">&#x5B98;&#x65B9;&#x6587;&#x6863;</a></li></ul><p style="margin: 0 0 1.1em; line-height: 1.6;">&#x9047;&#x5230;&#x7684;&#x95EE;&#x9898;&#x662F;&#xFF1A;</p><ul style="margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 1.1em; line-height: 1.6;"><li style="line-height: 1.6;">popen.communicate/read&#x4F1A;block&#x4E3B;&#x8FDB;&#x7A0B;&#xFF0C;&#x4E14;block&#x65F6;&#xFF0C;&#x65E0;&#x6CD5;&#x7528;ctrl+c&#x9000;&#x51FA;</li><li style="line-height: 1.6;">readline&#x59CB;&#x7EC8;&#x8FD4;&#x56DE;&#x7A7A;&#x5B57;&#x7B26;</li></ul><h4 style="font-family: inherit; font-weight: bold; color: inherit; margin-top: 10.5px; margin-bottom: 10.5px; font-size: 1.25em; margin: 1.2em 0 .6em 0; text-align: start; line-height: 1.6;">&#x89E3;&#x51B3;</h4><p style="margin: 0 0 1.1em; line-height: 1.6;">&#x6700;&#x540E;&#x89E3;&#x51B3;&#x7684;&#x65B9;&#x6848;&#x5728;&#x8FD9;&#x4E24;&#x4E2A;&#x7F51;&#x9875;&#x4E2D;&#xFF1A;</p><ul style="margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 1.1em; line-height: 1.6;"><li style="line-height: 1.6;"><a href="https://app.yinxiang.com/shard/s10/nl/161681/81960cae-4da2-4526-9ec2-3888b3fee1fd" target="_blank" style="background: transparent; color: #1980e6; text-decoration: none;">Startserver does not send data back to POpen.communicate</a></li><li style="line-height: 1.6;"><a href="https://app.yinxiang.com/shard/s10/nl/161681/ef454085-44d1-44c6-8862-42a889a855ab" target="_blank" style="background: transparent; color: #1980e6; text-decoration: none;">Bypassing buffering of subprocess output with popen in C or Python</a></li></ul><p style="margin: 0 0 1.1em; line-height: 1.6;">&#x7B80;&#x800C;&#x8A00;&#x4E4B;&#xFF0C;block&#x662F;&#x56E0;&#x4E3A;&#xFF0C;&#x6CA1;&#x6709;&#x5B57;&#x7B26;&#x8F93;&#x51FA;&#x5230;stdout&#xFF0C;&#x56E0;&#x4E3A;&#x5B58;&#x5728;&#x7F13;&#x5B58;&#xFF0C;&#x5BF9;python&#x91C7;&#x7528;<code style="font-family: &apos;Source Code Pro&apos;,monospace; font-size: .9em; padding: 2px 4px; color: #c7254e; background-color: #f9f2f4; white-space: normal; border-radius: 4px;">-u</code>&#x53EF;&#x4EE5;&#x89E3;&#x51B3;</p><h3 style="font-family: inherit; font-weight: bold; color: inherit; margin-top: 21px; margin-bottom: 10.5px; font-size: 1.7em; margin: 1.2em 0 .6em 0; text-align: start; line-height: 1.6;">2. Python Requests&#x5E93;&#x5728;&#x8BBF;&#x95EE;localhost&#x65F6;&#x51FA;503 Error</h3><p style="margin: 0 0 1.1em; line-height: 1.6;">&#x53C2;&#x770B;&#x8FD9;&#x4E2A;&#x7F51;&#x9875;&#xFF0C;&#x6765;&#x81EA;Stack Overflow <br><a href="https://app.yinxiang.com/shard/s10/nl/161681/272a1b96-68ed-4fc6-8bfa-4160c5f09907" target="_blank" style="background: transparent; color: #1980e6; text-decoration: none;">Python requests 503 erros when trying to access localhost:8000</a> <br>&#x95EE;&#x9898;&#x662F;&#x56E0;&#x4E3A;&#x516C;&#x53F8;&#x4EE3;&#x7406;&#x7981;&#x6B62;&#x81EA;&#x5DF1;ping&#x81EA;&#x5DF1;&#x3002;</p><h2 style="font-family: inherit; font-weight: bold; line-height: 1.1; color: inherit; margin-top: 21px; margin-bottom: 10.5px; font-size: 2.15em; margin: 1.2em 0 .6em 0; text-align: start;">&#x6574;&#x7406;</h2><p style="margin: 0 0 1.1em; line-height: 1.6;">SimpleHTTPServer&#x57FA;&#x4E8E;BaseHTTPServer&#xFF0C;&#x5E76;&#x63D0;&#x4F9B;&#x4E86;&#x6587;&#x4EF6;&#x5217;&#x8868;&#x4E0B;&#x8F7D;&#x670D;&#x52A1;&#x3002;&#x5B83;&#x662F;python&#x4E3A;BaseHTTPServer&#x63D0;&#x4F9B;&#x7684;&#x4F8B;&#x7A0B;&#x3002;&#x5F00;&#x53D1;&#x8005;&#x53EF;&#x4EE5;&#x57FA;&#x4E8E;&#x5B83;&#x5F00;&#x53D1;&#xFF0C;&#x6216;&#x8005;&#x53C2;&#x8003;&#x5B83;&#xFF0C;&#x5E76;&#x57FA;&#x4E8E;BaseHTTPServer&#x5F00;&#x53D1;&#x3002;</p></div><center style="display:none">%23%u4F7F%u7528HTML%u4F5C%u4E3APython%u7A0B%u5E8F%u7684UI%0A@%28%u5DE5%u4F5C%u7B14%u8BB0%29%5Bpython%2C%20http%5D%0A%60%60%60sequence%0AUpdater-%3ESimpleHTTPServer%3A1.Start%0AUpdater-%3EHTML%3A%202.Open%20in%20Browser%0AHTML-%3ESimpleHTTPServer%3A%203.POST%0ASimpleHTTPServer-%3EUpdater%3A4.PIPE%0AUpdater-%3ESimpleHTTPServer%3A5.Terminate%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%23%23%u95EE%u9898%0A%23%23%231.%20SimpleHTTPServer%u65E0%u6CD5%u901A%u8FC7%u7BA1%u9053%u8F93%u51FA%u4FE1%u606F%0A%u5728%u505A%u7B2C4%u6B65%u7684%u65F6%u5019%uFF0C%u9047%u5230%u4E86%u5F88%u5927%u7684%u632B%u6298%u3002%u7B2C1%u6B65%u91C7%u7528subprocess%u6A21%u5757%uFF0C%u6253%u5F00%u547D%u4EE4%60python%20MyHTTPServer.py%60%u3002%u5BF9subprocess%u7684%u4ECB%u7ECD%u53EF%u53C2%u8003%uFF1A%0A-%20%5B%20python%u5B50%u8FDB%u7A0B%u6A21%u5757subprocess%u8BE6%u89E3%u4E0E%u5E94%u7528%u5B9E%u4F8B%20%u4E4B%u4E00%5D%28https%3A//app.yinxiang.com/shard/s10/nl/161681/3fcc11e2-7d72-479f-9228-df72909bd465%29%0A-%20%5B%u5B98%u65B9%u6587%u6863%5D%28https%3A//docs.python.org/2/library/subprocess.html%23subprocess.CalledProcessError%29%0A%0A%u9047%u5230%u7684%u95EE%u9898%u662F%uFF1A%0A-%20popen.communicate/read%u4F1Ablock%u4E3B%u8FDB%u7A0B%uFF0C%u4E14block%u65F6%uFF0C%u65E0%u6CD5%u7528ctrl+c%u9000%u51FA%0A-%20readline%u59CB%u7EC8%u8FD4%u56DE%u7A7A%u5B57%u7B26%0A%0A%23%23%23%23%u89E3%u51B3%0A%u6700%u540E%u89E3%u51B3%u7684%u65B9%u6848%u5728%u8FD9%u4E24%u4E2A%u7F51%u9875%u4E2D%uFF1A%0A-%20%5BStartserver%20does%20not%20send%20data%20back%20to%20POpen.communicate%5D%28https%3A//app.yinxiang.com/shard/s10/nl/161681/81960cae-4da2-4526-9ec2-3888b3fee1fd%29%0A-%20%5BBypassing%20buffering%20of%20subprocess%20output%20with%20popen%20in%20C%20or%20Python%5D%28https%3A//app.yinxiang.com/shard/s10/nl/161681/ef454085-44d1-44c6-8862-42a889a855ab%29%0A%0A%u7B80%u800C%u8A00%u4E4B%uFF0Cblock%u662F%u56E0%u4E3A%uFF0C%u6CA1%u6709%u5B57%u7B26%u8F93%u51FA%u5230stdout%uFF0C%u56E0%u4E3A%u5B58%u5728%u7F13%u5B58%uFF0C%u5BF9python%u91C7%u7528%60-u%60%u53EF%u4EE5%u89E3%u51B3%0A%0A%23%23%232.%20Python%20Requests%u5E93%u5728%u8BBF%u95EElocalhost%u65F6%u51FA503%20Error%0A%u53C2%u770B%u8FD9%u4E2A%u7F51%u9875%uFF0C%u6765%u81EAStack%20Overflow%0A%5BPython%20requests%20503%20erros%20when%20trying%20to%20access%20localhost%3A8000%5D%28https%3A//app.yinxiang.com/shard/s10/nl/161681/272a1b96-68ed-4fc6-8bfa-4160c5f09907%29%0A%u95EE%u9898%u662F%u56E0%u4E3A%u516C%u53F8%u4EE3%u7406%u7981%u6B62%u81EA%u5DF1ping%u81EA%u5DF1%u3002%0A%0A%23%23%u6574%u7406%0ASimpleHTTPServer%u57FA%u4E8EBaseHTTPServer%uFF0C%u5E76%u63D0%u4F9B%u4E86%u6587%u4EF6%u5217%u8868%u4E0B%u8F7D%u670D%u52A1%u3002%u5B83%u662Fpython%u4E3ABaseHTTPServer%u63D0%u4F9B%u7684%u4F8B%u7A0B%u3002%u5F00%u53D1%u8005%u53EF%u4EE5%u57FA%u4E8E%u5B83%u5F00%u53D1%uFF0C%u6216%u8005%u53C2%u8003%u5B83%uFF0C%u5E76%u57FA%u4E8EBaseHTTPServer%u5F00%u53D1%u3002%0A%0A</center><br></div>
